thread.section_title: Fast Cover Travel Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fast Cover Travel Insurance | fastcover.com.au
thread.title: Geraldine Cooper
thread.title_full: Fast Cover Travel Insurance reviewed by Geraldine Cooper

author: Geraldine Cooper
title: Geraldine Cooper
text: After researching various travel insurance websites, I decided to go with Fastcover. The website is easy to use and I was able to insure myself without any problems. The only problem I had was when I tried to enter pre existing conditions, there was nowhere to do that and I came to the conclusion, rightly or wrongly, that if they were listed in the PDS, they were covered.
